author: Shanifa Nasser
title: Beloved Muslim community advocate who died of COVID-19 touched thousands with volunteer work
description: A tireless volunteer, a beloved teacher, and to many more simply “Babu Uncle” — members of Muslim communities in Toronto and Halifax are grieving the loss of Husain Bhayat, a man defined by his dedication to humanitarian causes and his kind, always-smiling ey…
content: A tireless volunteer, a beloved teacher, and to many more simply "Babu Uncle" members of  Muslim communities in Toronto and Halifax are grieving the loss of Husain Bhayat, a man being remembered as part of the bedrock of the community, defined by his dedicati… [+7455 chars]
